10103.name: {RC{re{8n{&t{8r{ra{Rl {6C{8a{&st{8l{6e {RC{ro{8m{&m{8o{rn{Rs{x
description: {xThis is the courtyard of the castle, the place where everyone
gathers to hear the {8F{7i{&r{7s{8t {RL{ror{Rd {8o{&f th{8e {6S{8h{&ie{8l{6d {xspeak.  Surrounded on
three sides by high walls with parapets and on the third with a large
tower.  It is quite {2tr{@a{8nq{@u{2il {xdespite the huge cache of weapon racks
and armed guards running drills.  A large {8f{&o{^u{6nt{^a{&i{8n {^b{6u{^b{6b{^l{6e{^s {xquietly in
the center, halfway up it is a circle with an eye in the center
surrounded by a ring of {&d{^i{6a{7mo{6n{^d{&s{x.  To the south is the inner level of
the castle and above that is a tower.  The courtyard continues to the
east and west, with the main gates to the north.
On the fountain is a replica of the legendary Shield of Silvam,
which was reputedly crafted by the wizard Zhyra Bardson-Ithal.  It is
a circular shield with an eye in the center surrounded by a ring of
eight diamonds.  It is the Knights clan symbol and where they took
their name.

10106.name: {RA{rl{8ch{&em{8is{rt{Rs {!S{1h{8o{&p{x
description: Thin, wispy smoke trails come from the burning incense on the
counter and many flasks and vials over magical flames.  On the counter
are scrolls, flasks, and vials of all shapes and sizes each
individually labeled and categorized.  Behind the counter, a gaunt old
shopkeeper traces arcane symbols onto parchment while periodically
glancing over to keep his concoctions from bubbling over.

description: {xYou stand in a tower made of {8s{7t{8o{7n{8e {xthat overlooks the courtyard
below.  The walls and floor are smooth, and there is very little
lighting.  Against the western wall is a large bookshelf, containing
books of {8d{7ar{8k {rm{ya{Yg{Gi{6c{x {xand {rd{8e{&a{8t{rh{x.  In the center of the room, you can see
a large altar surrounded by runes and grooves on the floor.  The
grooves channel {rbl{Roo{1d {xto be used for {8d{7ar{8k {xsummoning rituals.
A glistening black stone altar sits in the middle of the floor, in
the center of the altar is a rune covered skull.  From the mouth of
the skull a stream of blood trickles past the canines onto the altar,
then down the side to the floor.

10109.name: {6C{8a{&st{8l{6e {!S{1t{&u{1d{!y{x
description: This is the room where new recruits can learn the basic battle
tactics and other skills important to their various trades.  This is
also the room where many modern combat tactics and strategies were
developed.  The whole room is made from a mirror like reflective black
stone and covered in protective runes to help contain the blasts from
newly discovered spells.

knights of the order are able to further hone their skills.  Metal
racks line all the walls filled with various pieces of heavy weaponry
and armor to be used for sparring matches.  Several dark spots of
dried blood are scattered throughout the room from past fights.

tomes, and crates of potions and spell components.  All this is
testament to the {RK{rn{8i{&g{8h{rt{Rs {xprowess in battle and political influence.

10124.name: {6S{8h{&ie{8l{6d {RC{ro{8u{&n{8c{ri{Rl {8R{&oo{8m{x
description: {xA large circular table dominates this room with an eye in the
center.  Above that is a crystal chandelier that sheds light through
the room.  There are eight seats to the table, one for each {Rl{ror{Rd {xand
the last for the {8h{7i{&dd{7e{8n {Rl{ror{Rd{x.  This is the council chambers of the
castle, its where the seven {6s{8h{&ie{8l{6d {xcouncil members meet to chart the
direction of the order, coordinate its members activities, and
increasing the order's power and influence.  Lead by the {8H{7i{&dd{7e{8n {RL{ror{Rd
{8o{&f th{8e {6S{8h{&ie{8l{6d{x, all of the decisions made by the order come through
this room.

enclose the rest of the compound are barely narrow enough to fit
people through two at a time.  The stone floors have been polished to
a dull shine while the walls are strangely void of any decoration
except for several holes and slits, better known as murder holes.

paired off and are sparring with each other.  Along the parameter are
racks filled with every kind of weapon imaginable.

10112.name: {xMeadric the {RC{rl{De{Wan{Ds{re{Rr{x~
description:
{xA extremely large being sits here sharpening his axe.  He is Meadric
{xthe Cleanser.  From what you can gather he appears to be a Half-Orc,
{xbut the dark cowl covering his head and the midnight robes he wears
{xhides his main features.  He lies in wait to correct those who have
{xwandered from the correct path.
subroutines:
F res B
F vul FI
F for AHZ
F par ACDEFGHIJKPQUVX
M SPEECH 10125 cleanse me~

10113.name: {WI{*ro{Wn {*Clad {wWhite {cS{*t{Walli{*o{cn{x~
description:
Ahead of you stands a proud steed, the sun sparkles off its glistening
white coat.  Its mane flows gracefully from its proud head as an
expression of its majestic form.  Adorned with the finest of armor,
it looks as if it is ready to carry the likes of a hero.
subroutines:
F res E
F for AHZ
F par ACDEFGHIJKPQUVX
10113.room_name: An impressive White Stallion stands firmly before you.

10122.name: Toda the beastmaster~
description:
A young boy in his late teens stands before you.  He stands about 5'6" 
with light blonde hair. He is wearing a squires tunic along with a pair
of black pantaloons. As you watch you see that he takes great pride in
the care of the Shields War Stallions.  He looks strong, and willful and
shall make a great Knight one day.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10122.room_name: Toda the stable boy is here tending ot the stallions.

10123.name: {x[{6K{8o{&t{6S{x] Symbol~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

10100.name: Briabard~
description:
Here stands a Knight encased in a full set of Duergar Full Plate Mail.
Wielding a large battle axe in his right hand with a shield in the other
he stands his post with great bearing and honor.  Allowing no one to 
pass but those who belong to the Knights of the Shield.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10100.room_name: Briabard stands guard at the door.

10101.name: Freabard~
description:
Here stands a Knight encased in a full set of Duergar Full Plate Mail.
Wielding a large battle axe in his right hand with a shield in the other
he stands his post with great bearing and honor.  Allowing no one to
pass but those who belong to the Knights of the Shield.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10101.room_name: Freabard stands guard at the door.

10102.name: Jaedan~
description:
A power yet beautiful wizard stands before you.  She is wearing the
Robe of the Red Cloth.  She wields a gnarled oaken staff in her hand.
Her long golden hair flows over her shoulders and down her back.  She
stares at you over her spectacles.  Her crimson red lips begin to utter an
incantation and she vanishes into the fabric of existence.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M FIGHT 10118 85~
10102.room_name: Jaedan the Wise lies in hiding.

10103.name: {cA{Dr{Wa{Dl{ci{x~
description:
{xA priest stands before you as you enter.  In his middle ages standing
{xabout 6'2", a man stands garbed in the robes of the {RRe{rd Cl{Roth{x is
{xtending to his wounded {RK{rn{Di{Wg{Dh{rt{Rs{x.  He kneels, raising his holy symbol
{xtowards the sky, and begins to pray.  A bright light shines from his
{xhands and enters his patient.  He rests as he waits for his next patient.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10103.room_name: {RA{rc{Do{Wl{Dy{rt{Re {cA{Dr{Wa{Dl{ci{x of the {RRe{rd Cl{Roth{x stands here offering healing.

10104.name: the {6A{8v{&at{8a{6r {8o{&f {RG{ra{8r{&ag{8u{rt{Rh{x~
description:
{^A terrible {8black {^and {@g{2r{@e{2e{@n {1d{8e{&m{8o{1n {^stands here, it is over 11 feet
tall not including the massive horns curling out the back of its
skull.  The demon looks up from the altar at you, eyes flashing
{3y{#e{3ll{#o{3w{^.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

10105.name: Your sparring partner~
description:
A knight stands in the center of the room covered in a
set of worn leather armor.  He looks around the room
quickly scanning all the corners of the room checking
for people willing to spar with him.  In his hand is
a metal sword, notched from many sparring matches
in the past.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 10123 100~
10105.room_name: A weaker knight stands here, ready to train new members.

10106.name: Your sparring partner~
description:
{xA knight stands here fully clad in shining metal
{xarmor engraved with the crest of the {RK{rn{Di{Wg{Dh{rt{Rs {Do{Wf{x
{Wth{De {cS{Dh{Wie{Dl{cd{x.  There are a few small scratches
{xacross his chest from long and fierce sparring
{xmatches in the past.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 10122 100~
10106.room_name: An armored knight is here to test the strongest members.

10107.name: {xa {#h{3ol{#y {xpriest~
description:
{^A young girl stands at the door smiling slightly.  Dressed in {&w{7h{&i{7t{&e
{^robes with {7s{8i{7lv{8e{7r {^trim, she holds a book in her hand that radiates
holiness.  {x
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10107.room_name: {xThe {#h{3ol{#y {xpriest of the {RK{rn{8i{Wg{8h{rt{Rs {8o{Wf th{8e {6S{8h{Wie{8l{6d{x is here offering you salvation.

10108.name: {xan {8u{1n{!ho{1l{8y {xpriest~
description:
{^A young man stands at the door frowning slightly.  Dressed in {8black
{^robes with {Bb{blu{Be {^trim, he holds a book in his hand that radiates evil. 
{x
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10108.room_name: {xThe {8u{1n{!ho{1l{8y {xpriest of the {RK{rn{8i{Wg{8h{rt{Rs {8o{Wf th{8e {6S{8h{Wie{8l{6d{x is here offering you damnation.

10109.name: Doetz~
description:
Standing in the corner by the anvil is a very stout dwarf. He is
of mithril.  He appears to be repairing armor from the Knights last
escapades.  He looks up noticing you and grabs his ale on his way to
the counter.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10109.room_name: Weaponmaster Doetz offers his wares for sale.

10110.name: Darius the Alchemist~
description:
A man in his later years, appearing to be feeble sits behind the counter.
His clothes are covered in different herbs and powders that appear to
have been thrown everywhere.  His full attention is on the potion at
hand he appears to be making.  As soon as you walk up to the counter
there is a loud BOOM!  He looks up covered in soot.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10110.room_name: Darius is here, fiddling with flasks and vials.

10111.name: Grorerin~
description:
A battle seasoned man stands in the center of the room.  He is
wearing a tunic with the symbol of Gargauth upon it.  His voice
staggers around the room as he shouts commands to the students
training.  Upon your entrance, he orders you to post.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
10111.room_name: Master Grorerin is yelling at students to train harder.
